Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>It looks like you've got some space in
your pouch now.<sp:0:4:0>Which means the time has come...<sp:5:0:0>to give
you the reward for the favor I asked!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease_00>What? <sp:5:0:0>I thought she'd been hiding
something big. Is that really all there
was to it?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I know my sister says a lot about charisma
and style, and has to do everything in the
most ostentatious way possible.<sp:0:4:0>But between you and me...<sp:5:0:0>her tastes are
pretty plain. She loves the slow life here
in Hateno Village.<sp:0:4:0>She probably told you she came back here
because of development or whatever.<sp:0:4:0>But the truth is, she just wanted to eat
the vegetables grown right here in her
hometown again.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>At least, I'm pretty sure that's the case.<sp:5:1:0>
Either way, I'm so glad she wasn't up to
anything scandalous.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I want you to have this in exchange for
helping me out.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh. Of course.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>I thought you maybe had the same
tendency as me to get caught up in
things. I felt almost a kinship with you.
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ahhh, how I enjoy my nightly vegetables.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>The shine, the luster, the fragrance...
Yes indeed. <sp:5:1:0>Now this is luxury dining!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>And so, without further ado, let us tuck in.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you succeed in finding out what she's
doing, I can reward you, of course.<sp:0:4:0>You're the only one I can ask for help.
I don't want any of the villagers finding
out until I know what's going on.<sp:0:4:0>Help me out, please!
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Wh-whaaat?!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Well now! This is a fine turn of events.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff><sp:3:0:2:0900>Unbelievable! <sp:5:0:0>How did you get in here?!<sp:0:4:0>This is MY silo. I can't have just anyone
coming in and out at all hours of the day!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Shoo! Shoo! Off you go!
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Oh...you again. Are you still here?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900>I have an important errand to attend to.
And I shall be very cross if anyone <clr:0000>follows
me<clr:ffff> trying to snoop into my business!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Off you go, then. Shoo.<sp:0:4:0>If there's anything to discuss, we can go
over it at Ventest Clothing in the morning.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Perfect. <sp:5:0:0>I do believe nobody saw me.<sp:0:4:0>I'm free to enjoy another of my late-night
meals in <sp:5:0:0>se<sp:5:0:0>cret!
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ahem. <sp:5:0:0>Business hours at Ventest Clothing
are almost over. I have an errand to run,
so I must take my leave.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0901>While I understand that I cut a very
dashing figure, my private time is my
own and no one else's.
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Oh...<sp:5:0:0>you again. <sp:5:0:0>What are you doing here?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900>I've just finished up an important errand.
I certainly wasn't doing <clr:0000>anything fishy<clr:ffff>!<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>Off you go, then. Shoo.<sp:0:4:0>If there's anything to discuss, we can go
over it at Ventest Clothing in the morning.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>So scrumptious. <sp:5:0:0>The crisp, smooth
taste is a sign they were grown on a diet
of pure water.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Thanks to the farmer's deft touch and the
quality of the soil, I can even eat the skin
without misgivings.<sp:0:4:0>Honestly, vegetables from anywhere but
Hateno Village simply don't count. They're
nowhere near as filling.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though I've built a reputation on flash and
glamour, here in private, I must admit that
the simple, unadorned things are best.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>There's simply no denying it, alas.
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But now that I'm full for tonight, it's best
that I return home.<sp:0:4:0>If I don't return quickly, Sophie may start
to suspect something.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hmm. I think it's about time to kick off
the <clr:0000>mayoral election<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>You've been a tremendous help. I hope
you'll stick around to watch!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Everything's ready! Please let me know if
you want to join in.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's late by now, so it might be better to
start when the sun's up.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Too bad about this rain. It might be better
to start once the weather clears up.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, hello. Don't I remember you
from before?<sp:0:4:0>I'm sorry for all the commotion you got
mixed up in.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Um, sir?<sp:0:4:0>I feel like I should apologize for dragging
you into this mess I've found myself in.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>She saddled me with so much work
when she put me in charge of the
mayoral election...
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Oh! I haven't seen you in a while.<sp:0:4:0>It's been some time since I troubled you
to <clr:0000>follow <clr:ffff>my sister to wherever she
sneaks off to <clr:0000>at night<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I was beginning to think you only
pretended to accept my request as
a cruel joke.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_00>I've tried <clr:0000>following <clr:ffff>her several times
myself, you know. But she's incredibly
<clr:0000>alert <clr:ffff>and spotted me immediately.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Since I can't do it myself, and since the
mayoral election is so close, I really need
your help with this.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm so sorry to ask you to get involved
in what's really my problem.<sp:0:4:0>I know it's a big favor to ask you to <clr:0000>follow<clr:ffff>
my sister to wherever she's sneaking off
to in the <clr:0000>middle of the night<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>But the mayoral election is so close that
this would be a bad time for any surprises
about her to get out.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>You should know that she's incredibly
<clr:0000>alert <clr:ffff>on these walks of hers, so be careful
<clr:0000>not to enter her line of sight<clr:ffff>.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>So what happened was...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Umm... <sp:5:0:0>This is actually something I could use your
help with...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_33:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Shhh! <sp:5:0:0>We can't talk about this around my sister.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Find me outside the shop when it's light out. We can
talk then.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Sorry, but we shouldn't talk about this around
my sister.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Find me outside the shop when it's light out. We can
talk then.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_35:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>I'm so sorry to ask you to <clr:0000>follow <clr:ffff>my sister. I know
how shady it sounds.<sp:0:4:0>She's right over there, so I have to keep this quiet,
but she's incredibly <clr:0000>alert <clr:ffff>when walking.<sp:0:4:0>Be sure you <clr:0000>don't enter her line of sight<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>My sister really is a handful sometimes.<sp:0:4:0>Both she and Reede want the same
things, you know.<sp:0:4:0>I can't understand why the two of them
don't just work together instead of going
to such bizarre lengths.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ah!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>These little night jaunts were meant to be private...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_00><clr:ffff>S-splendid evening, traveler. Will you look
at the time! I'd best return home.<sp:0:4:0>You should be on your way too, hmm?
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Wh-whaaat?!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Well now! This is a fine turn of events.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff><sp:3:0:2:0900>How in the world did you get in here?
Into MY silo, I might note.<sp:0:4:0>I can't have just anyone coming in and
out at all hours of the day! Shoo! Shoo!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Aaah! I should have expected that.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>The thing I need your advice on is my
sister... It's about <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Lately, she's been sneaking off<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>alone in
the <clr:0000>middle of the night<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I don't think it's anything sinister, but the
election is soon, and I don't want any
last-minute surprises to hurt her chances.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>So I'd like you to <clr:0000>tail <clr:ffff>my sister, find out
where she's going and what she's up to,
and get back to me.<sp:0:4:0>I've tried following her myself, but <clr:0000>she
spotted me <clr:ffff>right away!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I really got an earful about it too.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So that's where my sister has been
spending her time.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>But what I still want to know is, <clr:0000>what is
she doing <clr:ffff>in there?<sp:0:4:0>The window is <clr:0000>up too high<clr:ffff> for me to see
inside. And I don't see how I'd climb up
there without a ladder.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There must be some way to see what
she's up to in secret...
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>What could my sister be getting up to
inside that silo?<sp:0:4:0>The window is <clr:0000>up too high<clr:ffff> for me to see
inside. But how else am I going to find
out what's going on with her?
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ah!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I can't skulk 10 paces without interruption tonight.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_00><clr:ffff>S-splendid evening, traveler. It isn't polite
to be creeping around these paths at
night, you know.<sp:0:4:0>Someone might mistake you for an
unsavory character.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_00>Sorry about this. I know it's a tall order,
asking you to <clr:0000>tail <clr:ffff>my sister, but I'm just
so nervous about her.
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Oh...I had a reward for you, but your bag
doesn't have room for it.<sp:0:4:0>Guess I won't be giving you these
10 ironshrooms.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Not until you come back after making
space for them, at least!
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But since we are both involved now,
could you give me a little advice?
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I planned to reward you with 10
ironshrooms for doing what I asked.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But that'll have to wait until you come
back with room for them in your pouch.
